quests.desc: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First thing I need you to do is to attempt to travel south. With that over with, try to go south. And then, head east. After that, go to the north. Then, venture north. Then, attempt to go to the east. And then, make an attempt to head south. Okay, and then, recover the mop from the cabinet. After that, go east. After that, toss the mop on the floor of the attic. That's it!

infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
This just in- You, in the attic.

 You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a toolbox.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The toolbox contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: laundry place
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the laundry place.

 You make out a cabinet. The light flickers for a second, but nothing else happens.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The cabinet is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
Well I'll be, you are in the place we're calling the office. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an unblocked exit to the south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
You are in a workshop. A normal kind of place.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: parlor
infos.desc:
You are in a parlor. It seems to be pretty normal here. The room is well lit.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: scullery
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a scullery.

 You make out [if c_2 is locked]a locked[else if c_2 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] non-euclidean locker in the corner.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The non-euclidean locker contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] What a letdown! The non-euclidean locker is empty![end if] [if c_3 is locked]A locked[else if c_3 is open]An open[otherwise]A closed[end if] chest, which looks normal, is here.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a shower.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a cellar. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.

 Were you looking for a locker? Because look over there, it's a locker.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You're now in the studio.

 You see [if c_5 is locked]a locked[else if c_5 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] box.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The box contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The box is empty, what a horrible day![end if] Look over there! a shelf. The shelf is normal.[if there is something on the s_0] On the shelf you can see [a list of things on the s_0]. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] But the thing is empty. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading west. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: recreation zone
infos.desc:
You are in a recreation zone. A typical one.

 Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a couch. Make a note of this, you might have to put stuff on or in it later on. [if there is something on the s_1]On the couch you make out [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]But there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
You are in a spare room. A normal one.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: laundromat
infos.desc:
You're now in a laundromat.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the north.

infos.name: canteen
infos.desc:
You're now in a canteen.



There is an unblocked exit to the south. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: salon
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a salon.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: bar
infos.desc:
Well how about that, you are in a place we're calling a bar.

 You can see a mantle. The mantle is usual.[if there is something on the s_2] On the mantle you see [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: steam room
infos.desc:
You arrive in a steam room. A typical one. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.

 You can make out a rectangular box.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The rectangular box contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The rectangular box is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: closet
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a closet.

 Hey, want to see a rack? Look over there, a rack. [if there is something on the s_3]On the rack you see [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a cubicle.

 You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a stand. The stand is standard.[if there is something on the s_4] On the stand you can see [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4] But the thing is empty.[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an unblocked exit to the south.

infos.name: sauna
infos.desc:
You've entered a sauna.



There is an unguarded exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
I am stoked to announce that you are now in the bedchamber. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'

 Look over there! a dresser.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The dresser contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] The dresser is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the north.

infos.name: hatch
infos.desc: The hatch looks ominous. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: cabinet
infos.desc: The cabinet looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: toolbox
infos.desc: The toolbox looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: non-euclidean locker
infos.desc: The non-euclidean locker looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: chest
infos.desc: The chest looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: locker
infos.desc: The locker looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: box
infos.desc: The box looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: rectangular box
infos.desc: The rectangular box looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: dresser
infos.desc: The dresser looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: loaf of bread
infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that ordinary thing.

infos.name: stick of butter
infos.desc: The stick of butter looks appetizing.

infos.desc: that's an usual grape!

infos.desc: that's an ordinary sandwich!

infos.desc: that's a normal broccoli!

infos.desc: The candy bar looks savory.

infos.name: peanut
infos.desc: The peanut looks appetizing.

infos.name: licorice strip
infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that typical thing.

infos.name: latchkey
infos.desc: The latchkey is cold to the touch

infos.name: iron
infos.desc: The iron is unremarkable.

infos.name: butterfly
infos.desc: The butterfly appears to fit in here

infos.name: insect
infos.desc: The insect is unremarkable.

infos.name: paper towel
infos.desc: The paper towel is unremarkable.

infos.name: binder
infos.desc: The binder appears to be out of place here

infos.name: sock
infos.desc: The sock would seem to be out of place here

infos.name: shelf
infos.desc: The shelf is wobbly.

infos.name: couch
infos.desc: The couch is shaky.

infos.name: mantle
infos.desc: The mantle is unstable.

infos.name: rack
infos.desc: The rack is balanced.

infos.name: stand
infos.desc: The stand is shaky.

infos.name: burger
infos.desc: that's an ordinary burger!

infos.name: chocolate bar
infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that standard thing.

infos.name: banana
infos.desc: that's a standard banana!

infos.desc: The non-euclidean keycard is cold to the touch

infos.name: keycard
infos.desc: The metal of the keycard is hammered.

infos.desc: The metal of the rectangular keycard is polished.

infos.name: mop
infos.desc: The mop would seem to be to fit in here

infos.desc: The broom is clean.

infos.desc: The disk is dirty.

objective: You are now playing a exciting round of TextWorld! Here is how to play! First step, venture south. And then, make an attempt to head south. With that over with, venture east. Then, head north. With that done, make an effort to go north. Then, attempt to head east. After that, try to take a trip south. Then, retrieve the mop from the cabinet. If you can get your hands on the mop, make an attempt to take a trip east. Okay, and then, toss the mop on the floor of the attic. Once that's all handled, you can stop!
